SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: UPDATE emailbccaccount SET EmailBccAccountID=@@EmailBccAccountID@@ <%=,EmailBccAccountAddress=@@EmailBccAccountAddress@@%><%=,EmailBccAccountName=@@EmailBccAccountName@@%><%=,EmailBccAccountCreateTime=@@EmailBccAccountCreateTime@@%><%=,EmailBccAccountLastTime=@@EmailBccAccountLastTime@@%><%=,EmailBccAccountIsDel=@@EmailBccAccountIsDel@@%> WHERE EmailBccAccountID=@@EmailBccAccountID@@;

SELECT EmailBccAccountID,EmailBccAccountAddress,EmailBccAccountName,EmailBccAccountCreateTime,EmailBccAccountLastTime,EmailBccAccountIsDel FROM emailbccaccount WHERE 1=1 <%= AND EmailBccAccountID=@@EmailBccAccountID@@%> <%= AND EmailBccAccountAddress=@@EmailBccAccountAddress@@%> <%= AND EmailBccAccountName=@@EmailBccAccountName@@%> <%= AND EmailBccAccountCreateTime=@@EmailBccAccountCreateTime@@%> <%= AND EmailBccAccountLastTime=@@EmailBccAccountLastTime@@%> <%= AND EmailBccAccountIsDel=@@EmailBccAccountIsDel@@%>;

SELECT EmailBccAccountID,EmailBccAccountAddress,EmailBccAccountName,EmailBccAccountCreateTime,EmailBccAccountLastTime,EmailBccAccountIsDel FROM emailbccaccount WHERE 1=1 <%= AND EmailBccAccountID=@@EmailBccAccountID@@%> <%= AND EmailBccAccountAddress=@@EmailBccAccountAddress@@%> <%= AND EmailBccAccountName=@@EmailBccAccountName@@%> <%= AND EmailBccAccountCreateTime=@@EmailBccAccountCreateTime@@%> <%= AND EmailBccAccountLastTime=@@EmailBccAccountLastTime@@%> <%= AND EmailBccAccountIsDel=@@EmailBccAccountIsDel@@%> LIMIT <R%= @@StartIndex@@, @@SelectCount@@ %R> ; SELECT COUNT(0) AS row_count FROM emailbccaccount WHERE 1=1 <%= AND EmailBccAccountID=@@EmailBccAccountID@@%> <%= AND EmailBccAccountAddress=@@EmailBccAccountAddress@@%> <%= AND EmailBccAccountName=@@EmailBccAccountName@@%> <%= AND EmailBccAccountCreateTime=@@EmailBccAccountCreateTime@@%> <%= AND EmailBccAccountLastTime=@@EmailBccAccountLastTime@@%> <%= AND EmailBccAccountIsDel=@@EmailBccAccountIsDel@@%>;
